alert.note: Alert for Morrison; Stearns; Todd (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 20 at 7:07PM CDT until June 20 at 7:30PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN TODD...NORTHWESTERN STEARNS AND SOUTHWESTERN MORRISON COUNTIES... At 707 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Grey Eagle, or 20 miles west of Little Falls, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Swanville around 710 PM CDT. Flensburg around 715 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include St. Rosa, Long Prairie Airport, Round Prairie, New Munich, Sauk Centre Airport, Sobieski, Burtrum, North Shore, Little Sauk and Pleasant Beach. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
